Weather Forecast.name: Weather Forecast
Weather Forecast.prompt: Provide a weather report based on the following forecast data for the next 7 days in {{location}}: ###{{weather}}###\n\nDiscuss how this might affect my events over the next week. Consider the purpose and type of each event. My events are: ###{{weekEvents}}###
Weather Forecast.description: Summarizes the forecast for the next 7 days and discusses any impacts on scheduled calendar events

Location Significance.description: Provides an overview of the history of your current location
Location Significance.prompt: What is the significance and history of {{location}}? Format your response as a friendly paragraph.
Location Significance.name: Location Significance

Crypto Performance Today.description: Provides a brief overview of crypto performance using data from coincap.io
Crypto Performance Today.name: Crypto Performance Today
Crypto Performance Today.prompt: Tell me about the performance of crypto currencies today using the data below. Use simple terms. Give the current value of each currency in USD. Output one friendly paragraph. Here's the data: ###{{https://api.coincap.io/v2/assets}}###

Crypto Performance Table.name: Crypto Performance Table
Crypto Performance Table.description: Provides a tabular overview of crypto performance using data from coincap.io
Crypto Performance Table.prompt: Tell me about the performance of crypto currencies today using the data below. Format the output as a markdown table. Here's the data: ###{{https://api.coincap.io/v2/assets}}###
